Task List

Title Status priority Assigned To Action
{{ task.title }} {{ task.status }} {{ task.priority }} {{ task.assignedTo }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { TaskManagerService } from 'src/app/services/task-manager.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-task-list-component', templateUrl: './task-list-component.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task-list-component.component.css'] }) export class TaskListComponentComponent { taskList:any constructor(public TaskManagerService:TaskManagerService){} ngOnInit(){ this.TaskManagerService.getTaskManagerList().subscribe((el)=>{ this.taskList=el }) } }
